textBeforeTable: Absolutely! Bring as many colleagues as you’d like! In fact we’ve implemented three group ticketing packages at substantial discounts to help you: May more than one person from my company attend?    Space is limited – so the last day for registration will be when we meet the limit. SMX Advanced has sold out in each and every year it’s been held. We recommend you register early to secure your pass and hotel accommodations. Hotels fill up quickly as well. top When is the last day to register for the conference?    Click here to see all of the SMX pass options and what you get. What passes are available and what can I attend?    Or call us on (877) 242-5242. Our business hours are 9am to 5pm ET, Monday to Friday. Click here: http://searchmarketingexpo.com/advanced/register How do I register?    Registration is located in Elliott Hall, on the street level. Wednesday, June 3 from 8:00am – 2:30pm Tuesday, June 2 from 7:30am – 7:00pm Monday, June 1 from 5:00pm – 7:30pm When can I pick up my badge?    Wednesday, June 3 from 10:00am – 2:00pm Tuesday, June 2 from 10:15am – 7:00pm What times are the Expo Hall
textAfterTable: What forms of payment are accepted and when is the payment due?  Payment is required to complete your registration. The following forms of payment are accepted: American Express, Visa, MasterCard, Discover, Diners Club and PayPal. Checks and wire transfers are also accepted. Make checks out to: Third Door Media, Inc.279 Newtown Turnpike, Redding, CT 06896 Call us at (877) 242-5242 for wire transfers. Our business hours are 9am to 5pm ET, Monday to Friday.   Cancellation Policy, Terms & Permission to Email  You may cancel your attendance by notifying our registration department by fax at (203) 702-5389 or email registration[at]searchmarketingexpo.com before April 30, 2015. Your registration will be refunded less a $100 processing fee. Cancellations on or after April 30, 2015 are non-refundable. You may transfer your registration to another person in your company at any time by notifying registration@searchmarketingexpo.com. Reselling SMX registrations is not permitted. Back to Top   How can I book a room?   During the registration process, you will have the opportunity to secure your accommodations at a special negotiated rate at the Westin Seattle and Seattle Marriott Waterfront. You may also book your room by calling (877) 242-5242..   Will transportation from to Bell Harbor be provided?  Yes – a free shuttle will be offered from the Westin Seattle.
